titleStmt.title: Pausanias, the betrayer of his country a tragedy, acted at the Theatre Royal by His Majesties servants / written by a person of quality.
titleStmt.author: Norton, Richard, 1666-1732.
Southerne, Thomas, 1660-1746.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Abel Roper, E. Wilkinson, and Roger Clavell ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by R. Norton. Cf. BM.
Dedication to Anto. Henly signed: Tho. Southerne.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
